title: No more reroll refound when an aram game is dodged ?
body:
Hello guys,

I've had this issue three times already and it's quite annoying. The last time was five minutes ago, during an ARAM champion select : i used two rerolls, someone dodged the game, and when the next aram champion select started i had 0 rerolls.

 I know for sure that last year this was not happening, i'm used to getting my rerolls back when some guy dodges the game. Is this a new thing ? Or is it a bug due to the new client ?

Cheers

replies.body:
Hey there,

I think I remember this coming up in discussions recently, off the top of my head I think the conclusion was made that it was one of these two things.

* A bug relating to the new client, causing you to lose a reroll when you should be refunded.
* A visual display bug, relogging should resolve this.

Let me know if you can confirm either of these.
